abstract: Though the iPad won’t be out until April 3, lots of software developers are looking for the first-out advantage.
snippet: Though the iPad won’t be out until April 3, lots of software developers are looking for the first-out advantage.
lead_paragraph: It can be difficult to write software for a gadget without being able to touch it. But that has not stopped developers from rushing to create applications for the Apple iPad.

headline.main: Rush Is On to Be First in iPad Apps
headline.print_headline: Rush Is On To Be First In iPad Apps

byline.original: By Brad Stone and Jenna Wortham

abstract: Apple has signed a deal with the largest distributor of independent publishers to sell electronic versions of it books on the new device, report Motoko Rich and Brad Stone on Media Decoder.
snippet: Apple has signed a deal with the largest distributor of independent publishers to sell electronic versions of it books on the new device, report Motoko Rich and Brad Stone on Media Decoder.
lead_paragraph: Apple has signed a deal with the largest distributor of independent publishers to sell electronic versions of it books on the new device, report Motoko Rich and Brad Stone on Media Decoder.

headline.main: Perseus Signs an E-Books Deal for the iPad
